Home.aboutText: At Kata Alpaca, we transform noble fibers into sustainable fashion. Our three-decade history reflects a commitment to Peruvian culture, excellence in every garment, and respect for our community.
Home.comSectTextAte: We work hand-in-hand with our clients in the development of their collections, taking care of every detail.
Home.comSectTextCal: Every garment goes through strict quality control to ensure it exceeds our customers' expectations.
Home.comSectTextSos: We prioritize recyclable materials and promote environmentally responsible processes.

aboutUs.paragraph1: We are a company from Arequipa with more than 33 years of experience in the alpaca textile sector. We started in 1991 offering services to industry leaders, which allowed us to perfect production techniques and high quality standards.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Over time we launched our own brand, working as a team to continuously innovate and improve our processes. Since 2002 we have been exporting to international markets such as the United States, Australia, Germany, United Kingdom, Ireland and France, where our clients recognize us for the excellence and quality of our products.
aboutUs.title: WHO WE ARE

bussiness.paragraph1: The high standards of quality that he learned during his years of experience and the new techniques he developed earned him recognition in the local market as a prominent producer.
bussiness.paragraph2: In 2002, for the first time, it made an export to the USA and began a long relationship with its client that continues to this day. Over the years, more and more clients from various parts of the world placed their trust in Edilberto for their orders and maintained long commercial relationships together.
bussiness.title: OUR COMPANY

commitment.paragraph: The most valuable asset of our company is our team. Each worker is important to the production chain, which is why we strive to train them in the latest textile technologies, provide them with a comfortable work environment that allows them to grow as professionals, and have a good quality of life.
commitment.title: OUR COMMITMENT

history.paragraph1: It begins in 1991 when Heriberto Muñoz, after working for years in the leading companies in the field, decided to start his own company with the dream of creating different garments that reach various parts of the world.
history.paragraph2: He started by providing manufacturing services for large companies, but his extensive knowledge of knitting led him to venture into the production of complete garments.
history.title: OUR HISTORY

mission.paragraph:
"At Kata Alpaca, we design, produce, and market
alpaca fiber clothing, using high-quality manufacturing processes
to provide products that offer comfort, style, and cultural value. We serve national and international markets, promoting sustainable development, decent employment, and the well-being of our Arequipa community, in harmony with the environment."

today.paragraph: Today the company is run by its two children: Eddy Mauricio and Patricia Muñoz, who are in charge of production and sales management of the company, always with the guidance and advice of their father.

vision.paragraph: "To establish ourselves by 2030 as a textile company from Arequipa that sustainably expands its presence in the national and international market, offering high-quality alpaca garments through production processes with accessible technology, generating well-being in our local community and promoting the cultural value of our roots."
